Text:
homer:
any chance of an ads remover patch?
one more thing, how do you save the chat view setting (simple/bubbles/playscript) and change your biography to something other than "Go Trillian! across astra restart.

The chat view settings should be saved automatically. I'm not sure about the biography, never used it really.

I'll see if I can include an ads remover in next build's patch :)

Oh ya, chat view is now saved. Apparently this is a genuine bug in build 68 and not a by-product of the hack. I still couldn't find the line in talk.ini etc. for the chat view though :p

Biography is definately not workng. I suspect that that info is being saved on the Astra server. If so, the only thing that can be done is to replace the "Go Trillian!" string locally.
